
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library('papaja')

df_results <- readRDS('test_results.rds')

# False positive results
fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv <- round((sum(df_results$fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv)/nrow(df_results))*100,2)
fp_directional_bf_conv <- round((sum(df_results$fp_directional_bf_upper_conv,
                                     df_results$fp_directional_bf_lower_conv)/nrow(df_results))*100,2)
fp_p_effect_conv <- round((sum(df_results$fp_p_effect_upper_conv,
                               df_results$fp_p_effect_lower_conv)/nrow(df_results))*100,2)
fp_rope_conv <- round((sum(df_results$fp_rope_conv)/nrow(df_results))*100,2)
fp_overall <- round((sum(df_results$fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv,
                         df_results$fp_directional_bf_upper_conv,
                         df_results$fp_directional_bf_lower_conv,
                         df_results$fp_p_effect_upper_conv,
                         df_results$fp_p_effect_lower_conv,
                         df_results$fp_rope_conv)/(nrow(df_results)*4))*100,2)

# Diverging results
dr_savage_dickey_bf_p_effect_conv <- sum(df_results$fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv !=
                                           (df_results$fp_p_effect_lower_conv |
                                              df_results$fp_p_effect_upper_conv))
dr_rope_p_effect_conv <- sum(df_results$fp_rope_conv !=
                               (df_results$fp_p_effect_lower_conv |
                                  df_results$fp_p_effect_upper_conv))
dr_savage_dickey_bf_rope <- sum(df_results$fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv !=
                                  df_results$fp_rope_conv)
dr_overall <- sum(df_results$fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv !=
                    df_results$fp_rope_conv |
                    (df_results$fp_p_effect_lower_conv |
                       df_results$fp_p_effect_upper_conv) |
                    (df_results$fp_directional_bf_upper_conv |
                       df_results$fp_directional_bf_lower_conv))
```

# **False positive results**
Overall, `r fp_overall` % of all hypothesis tests produced a false positive result. With the conventional decision thresholds, `r fp_savage_dickey_bf_conv` % of Savage-Dickey BFs, `r fp_p_effect_conv` % of P(effect > 0) proportions and `r fp_rope_conv` % of HDI + ROPE decisions were false positive. There were no false positive dBFs (?).
